caption.p: Effects of DEN exposure on hepatic lipid peroxidation. The formation of malondialdehyde (MDA) was analyzed in control, disease control (DEN treated), DEN+6-gingerol treatment, and only 6-gingerol treatment groups. Each bar represents the mean value of experiments performed in triplicate ± SEM ( n = 8, each group). ∗ p < 0.05 compared with the control group.
